title: Publisher investments fizzle, creator investments sizzle
description: In 2026, we’ll see a fundamental shift in what holds value in the media space. AI is commodifying content at scale, which means trust and authenticity (and how both get distribution) will be the only things that actually matter. And investments in the people who wield those powers — creators and journalists that bring with...
